@AurariaCampus @CUDenver
Whats the deal for in-person classes tomorrow?

@AurariaCampus @CCDedu @msudenver @CUDenver Auraira owes it to students of color, [as well as queer and disabled students] to reinstate the CollegePass. This allows for low-income folks to wield a sense agency while they are preparing to become fully-realized professionals. 

It is unconscionable to take this from us.
had an hour long meeting w a grad school counselor for @CUDenver and now i am more excited than nervous for grad applications ü•∫
RT @CUDenver: We are thinking of everyone impacted by all the recent fires, in particular the #EastTroublesomeFire that has grown tremendou‚Ä¶
@MarksMichelleA @CUDenver We have at least one faculty member who has done considerable work modeling forest fires.  Jan Mandel from Mathematical and Statistical Sciences.

@CUAnschutz @CUDenver U awards:

Lastely and importantly,
For a center grant, you're working with a lot of colleagues on this; make sure you have a healthy working relationship with them!

What are your thoughts about U grants?

(7/7)

@CUAnschutz @CUDenver U awards: 

When I write a nontypical grant, I very carefully read and use language from the RFA.

For this RFA, the data analysis core was responsible for power, data management, and data analysis.  So aims were (1) study design, (2) data management, (3) data analysis  

(5/)

I recently submitted a U2C with amazing colleagues at @CUAnschutz @CUDenver 

This mechanism was for a center that included 4 cores. I was the Data Analysis Core PI. 

Overall application was huge!
-6 pages for each core
-6 pages for project
-12 pages for overall center

(4/)
